def_en: Someone who is disinterested is not involved in a particular situation or not likely to benefit from it and is therefore able to act in a fair and unselfish way.

def_cn: 不感兴趣的;不关心的;冷漠的
def_en: If you are disinterested in something, you are not interested in it. Some users of English believe that it is not correct to use disinterested with this meaning.
